scripts.build: bun build sw.ts js/app.ts js/app.defer.ts css/app.css --outdir wwwroot --format iife --sourcemap
scripts.watch: bun build sw.ts js/app.ts js/app.defer.ts css/app.css --outdir wwwroot --format iife --sourcemap --watch
scripts.build:prod: bun build sw.ts js/app.ts js/app.defer.ts css/app.css --outdir wwwroot --format iife --sourcemap --production
